Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Racine
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound  Reroute near Austin/Washington
ShortDescription: Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Washington, Central, Madison and Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Washington, Central, Madison and Austin, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Austin/Washington.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #84 Peterson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Bryn Mawr/Broadway
ShortDescription: Westbound #84 Peterson buses are temporarily rerouted via Bryn Mawr, Broadway, Devon, Clark and Petterson, due to street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #84 Peterson buses are temporarily rerouted via Bryn Mawr, Broadway, Devon, Clark and Petterson, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Broadway.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard bound Red Line Service Delayed at Lawrence
ShortDescription: Howard bound Red Line trains are standing near Lawrence due to a sick customer.?Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard bound Red Line trains are standing near Lawrence due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes.

This may Include:
#22 Clark
#151 Sheridan
#36 Broadway 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
